page.title: 14Tourist Attraction
page.content: The country park in Cwmdare is a tourist attraction of this area. There are many ways to enjoy a visit here.One is to explore the area on foot looking at trees such as beech,sycamore and oak.The park has wildlife such as birds,squirrels and foxes.Wildlife in the lakes and reservoirs consists of trout, frogs, snails etc. The adventure playground,barbecue area,cafe and B.M.X. track are other attractions.Lately there has been "uproar" due to lack of staff to keep these amenities open.The local paper says the park "is fast becoming a white elephant."The appointment of a full time assistant will ensure that the park will cater for this summer's tourists. Altogether the park is an interesting and attractive area.
